name: VoRchestra
description:
VoRchestra is a virtual reality application for Oculus that aims to bring you a first-person musical experience, enjoying the thrill of taking the stage of a large theater and conducting an entire orchestra. 

The application is aimed at a public of any age who is passionate or fascinated to the world of music, curious to learn and experience firsthand the feeling of being in full harmony with the notes.

CONTROLS:
  1. Press "GRIP" to take items;
  2. Press "GRIP" + "TRIGGER" to acivate the objects;
  3. use Left Thumbsticks to move;
  4. use Right Thumbsticks to change the view.
ADDITIONAL ASSETS AND ADD ON: 
  1. Oculus Integration
  2. Blender Kit
OTHER RESOURCES (AVAILABLE LINK):
  • https://www.turbosquid.com/
  • https://www.mixamo.com/
  • https://free3d.com/
  • https://sketchfab.com/feed
CREDITS:

VoRchestra is an University project developed for the Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino.

The developers and members of the team are:

  • Galluzzi Leonardo
  • Merlo Riccardo
  • Nicolosi Eugenio
  • Tagliente Stefano
  • Zappia Silvia
